description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Support.Item.9Y5QKMvy0KsliE29]{Moth Support Benefit}

If you damage a Concealed or Hidden creature in your moth's reach with a Strike, that creature requires only a DC 3 Flat Check to target it if it's concealed, or DC 9 Flat Check if it's hidden.

rules.text: If you damage a Concealed or Hidden creature in your moth's reach with a Strike, that creature requires only a DC 3 Flat Check to target it if it's concealed, or DC 9 Flat Check if it's hidden. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.Db0Vtobv3v4Iybj5]{Effect: Moth Support Benefit (Penalty)}
